content.raw:
That could work for the depth camera. We'd need to make sure we're using the two images in sync.

For the GPU lidar, we could add a bridge conversion from `ignition::msgs::LaserScan` to `sensor_msgs::PointCloud2` like [this one](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/ros2/gazebo_ros/include/gazebo_ros/conversions/sensor_msgs.hpp#L176). (I haven't checked if the bridge supports conversion from one type to multiple other types. We already have a `sensor_msgs/LaserScan  <->ignition::msgs::LaserScan` conversion)
